name: Signal Spinner
description:
Oh looks like all the Satelites got turned off.

Your time to shine!

Shoot the different activation signals in space and hit the right satellites to reactivate them.
How fast can you solve this situation?

_____________________________________

This version is more a tech demo.
You can switch your signals and annoy some satellites that fly around you ;D

_____________________________________

Controlls:

Arrow left/right = switch signal color
Arrow up/down = zoom camera in/out
Space = Shoot the signal

_____________________________________

Feedback is allways welcome! :)
